sentences.sContent: Among the horses on sale he saw his own horse.
sentences.sContent_eng: Among the horses on sale he saw his own horse.
sentences.sCn: 在出售的马群中，他发现了自己的那匹马。

sentences.sContent: The latest model of this washer is now on sale in your shops.
sentences.sContent_eng: The latest model of this washer is now on sale in your shops.
sentences.sCn: 这种最新型号的洗衣机目前正在你们的商店中出售。

sentences.sContent: Netbooks running the software will go on sale in the second half of 2010.
sentences.sContent_eng: Netbooks running the software will go on sale in the second half of 2010.
sentences.sCn: 运行这套软体的上网本将会在2010年下半年开始销售。
